name: Star Rider Demo
description:
Feedback: https://forms.gle/BB19PDZXsEDNFyUW6

How to play(press h to close):

WASD/Arrows/(Controller: Left Control Stick) - speed up/slow down

Aim Mouse/(Controller: Right Control Stick) - aim

Left Click/(Controller: Right Trigger/A) - fire weapon

Right Click/(Controller: Left Trigger/X) - use ability(afterimage)

Q/E/(Controller: Left Bumper/Right Bumper) - rotate ship sideways

Follow us on Twitter for updates: https://twitter.com/TeamStarRider1
